page.title: 05The Church and Life
page.content:
{The Bishop of Rome}at that time had fallen to depravity and so the church of{Britain wasn't too concerned,}in fact rather happy in finding that one of{'her sons'}had a hand in the deposition of{Pope Urban}who while on a journey to Rome at the age of{67 died and was buried in{1397.
12th & 13th Century.
In the 12th Century Easton church probably consisted of a{squat square {west tower,}a long narrow{nave}and a semi-circular{apse}in the East end. The{windows}would have been quite {narrow openings}with semi-circular tops. The roof would have been {thatched.
